revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Granite Cave |image = [[File:Granite Cave.png|300px]] |caption = An outside view of Granite Cave. |tokens = 16,000 |location = South of Route 106. }} '''Granite Cave''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It initially has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 410,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat || colspan=2 rowspan=6|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Abra.png|40px]] Abra |- | [[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude |- | [[File:Makuhita.png|40px]] Makuhita |- | [[File:Aron.png|40px]] Aron |- | [[File:Sableye.png|40px]] Sableye |- |}
===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Mawile.png|40px]] Mawile || <center>960,000 || colspan=3 rowspan=2|<center> N/A |- | [[File:Nosepass.png|40px]] Nosepass || <center>660,000 |}
